SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class ListAnnouncementsController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.ListAnnouncementsController
public class ListAnnouncementsController extends Object
List Announcements Controller Class. This class is the controller for the endUser story of listing announcements. This class serves as an intermediary between the endUser interface and the repository and domain classes.

    Instantiates a new List Announcements Controller.
